name: Buzzy Plugin: Example recipe app
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This file contains a simple recipe app design (with dynamic content via REST APIs, and user-generated reviews) that has been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin.


Use this file as a reference for creating your own live app using Buzzy, straight from Figma. See our Support page for more tips, lessons and examples.
